text: @AGAshleyMoody My coworkers don't vape/smoke and tested positive for covid19, they was sick for weeks.  My test came back negative, I vape. If teens are being rushed to ER,  anyone keeping eye on them, where the parents? Stop spreading lies! Tear gas does that too by the way.
